name: Criya
all_locations: San Francisco, CA, USA; San Jose, CA, USA
long_description:
Criya, a Y Combinator and venture backed AI startup that empowers anyone to create professional collateral in seconds. Criya AI makes you and your ideas look exceptional. Save hours by effortlessly creating perfectly designed, interactive and high converting collateral in seconds.
Complete with on-brand, AI generated interactive landing pages, 1-pagers, presentation decks , built in engagement buttons, analytics, CRM, scheduler and more, Criya is a pivotal platform for entrepreneurs and sales professionals to capture prospects and decision makers within seconds.
one_liner: Creating stunning professional collateral, in seconds, with AI
